WorkItem.ClosedComment: Thanks for logging this issue. We've moved to a new codebase on GitHub; please try your issue against the new compiler (once it's possible) and log an issue on the GitHub site if it still reproduces

Comments.Message:
I stumbled upon that when working with many imports that I partly copied from another file. It then took me some time to figure out what I was doing wrong. So a more speaking error message would be great. 
Thank you!
Thanks for the report, certainly shouldn't be running out of stack space like that instead of a nice error.
